article.body: âHamiltonâ is coming to Disney+ in July, and thatâs really all you need to know. Sure, the Walt Disney Co. DIS, +1.53% Â streaming service is also adding a new Muppets series, âMuppets Nowâ (July 31), and movies like âSolo: A Star Wars Storyâ (July 10) and âThe Mighty Ducksâ (July 3), but the one true highlight will be the filmed version of the Broadway smash, starring Lin-Manuel Miranda and the rest of the original cast. âHamiltonâ was scheduled to be released in theaters in October 2021, but due to the pandemic, itâll drop instead on July 3, just in time for Fourth of July celebrations, which are likely to be more indoors this year. div.youtube { height:0; position:relative; padding-bottom:56.25%; } div.youtube > iframe { position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } Read more: Whatâs streaming in July on Netflix | Amazon Prime | Hulu | HBO Max Hereâs what else is on tap:Coming in July 2020 July 3 Animal ER (Seasons 1-2) Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules Ice Age: Collision Course Ice Road Rescue (Seasons 1-4) Race to Witch Mountain (2009) The Big Green The Mighty Ducks Hamilton Pixar in Real Life, Episode 109, âUP: Balloon Cart Awayâ Disney Family Sundays, Episode 135, âPeter Pan: Shadow Box Theaterâ One Day at Disney, Episode 131, âZama Magudulela: The Lion King Madrid, Spainâ Itâs a Dogâs Life with Bill Farmer, Episode 108, âMovie Star Dogs & Hounds and Horsesâ July 10 Critter Fixers: Country Vets (Season 1) Gigantosaurus (Season 1) Secrets of the Zoo (Season 3) Solo: A Star Wars Story Disney Family Sundays, Episode 136, âLilo and Stitch: Family Treeâ One Day at Disney, Episode 132, âMarc Smith: Story Artistâ Itâs a Dogâs Life with Bill Farmer, Episode 109 July 17 A Pre-Opening Report from Disneyland Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul Disney Junior Music Lullabies Lost City of Machu Picchu Super Robot Monkey Team Hyperforce Go!
